text: I just sent a spider packing.  I didn't kill it, but it left a big web over my back porch.  It is hard to speak spider.

text: Antarctica was the most beautiful place I've ever been.  Penguins, seals and whales, all completely oblivious to human beings.

user.name: Jeffrey Skoll
user.description: Founder/Chairman Participant Media, Skoll Foundation, Skoll Global Threats Fund, Capricorn Investment Group

text: In the Drake Passage in Antarctica.  Major waves.   This is truly the bottom of the world.

user.name: Jeffrey Skoll
user.description: Founder/Chairman Participant Media, Skoll Foundation, Skoll Global Threats Fund, Capricorn Investment Group

text: Also, deepest respect for Al Gore.  He is both a great friend and the finest leader the climate movement has ever had.

user.description: Founder/Chairman Participant Media, Skoll Foundation, Skoll Global Threats Fund, Capricorn Investment Group

text: I've had some excellent convos with the Climate Reality team today, feeling much better about the strategy.  There is a lot of good to come.

user.name: Jeffrey Skoll
user.description: Founder/Chairman Participant Media, Skoll Foundation, Skoll Global Threats Fund, Capricorn Investment Group

text: I'm not convinced I've heard the winning strategy.  Nor consulted.  And the ratio of climate presentations to seeing the Antarctic - slim.
